issue.message: This call is to a method from API 16, the call containing class null is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 16. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(16) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(16).

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "callable", in androidx.room.guava.GuavaRoom.createListenableFuture) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions
